1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti' yet max jay eb aj Zif, max yalon eb bay Saúl: A bay co tx'otx' chi c'ubaj el ba David, ẍi eb.</e> <pb/><t>¡Ach in Diosal ach wal caw chin a colo'! Colin elok yujtol chi je' oj masanil.</t>
2: <t>Ach in Diosal ab jun in txaj ti', acbaj a txiquin yin tzet chi wala'.</t>
3: <t>Yujtol mayal tit eb chi maynej ba c'al eb yaxc'ayinak win. Chi yochej eb chin cami. C'am elapnok yul sat eb.</t>
4: <t>Palta xin, ti wal ach ayach oc wetok. Ti' wal iquis inc'al oj.</t>
5: <t>A is yobc'ulalil eb ajc'ul oc win, ok meltzoj oc yiban eb oj. <pb/>C'aycan el eb Mamin, yujtol chak'c'al yun tzet chala'.</t>
6: <t>Ok wak' in xajanbal yul wet ayach Mamin Jehová, cax ok ach in bitnej yujtol watx' ach,</t>
7: <t>yujtol max in a colcan el yin masanil in bilc'ulal. Max wilon yayc'ay eb ajc'ul oc win.</t>
